documentation: # Freshsales This guide walks you through setting up the Freshsales integration within Boltic. ## Prerequisites To set up the Freshsales integration, you'll need: - A Freshsales account - The Freshsales domain name - The Freshsales API Key ## Setting Up the Freshsales Integration in Boltic 1. **Log In** - Log into your Freshsales account dashboard. 2. **Obtain API Key** - Click on your **Profile Icon** > **Settings** > **API Settings**. - In the API Settings tab, complete the authentication to view your API Key. - Copy the API Key to your clipboard. 3. **Log into Boltic** - Log into your Boltic account or navigate to the Boltic Open Source dashboard. 4. **Navigate to Integrations** - Click on `Sources` and then click on `+ Add New source`. 5. **Select Source Type** - On the Set up the source page, search for `Freshsales` from the search bar and select it. 6. **Configure Integration** - **Name:** Enter a name for the Freshsales integration. - **Domain:** Enter your Freshsales domain name. For example, if your Freshsales URL is `www.xyz.myfreshworks.com/crm/sales`, your domain is `xyz`. - **API Key:** Paste the API Key copied from the Freshsales API Settings. 7. **Details (Optional)** - **Tags:** Add any tags for categorization. - **Description:** Provide a brief description of the integration. 8. **Test and Save Integration** - Click `Test Connection` to ensure the provided details are correct and the connection is successful. - Once the connection test is successful, click `Set up source` to complete the configuration. ## Setting Up Freshsales Webhooks Freshsales uses webhooks to trigger a scenario when an event occurs. To set up a webhook: 1. Add a Freshsales instant module to your scenario and click **Create a webhook**. 2. **Webhook Name:** Enter a name for the webhook (optional). 3. **Connection:** Select the corresponding connection for the webhook. 4. Click **Save** and then **Copy address to clipboard**. 5. Log in to your Freshsales account using Login to the Freshsales Account. 1. **How do I find my Freshsales API Key?** - Navigate to your Freshsales account settings and look for the API Settings tab to find your API Key. Follow the instructions provided earlier in this guide. 2. **What should I do if my connection fails?** - Ensure your API Key is correct. - Verify the domain name and ensure there are no typos. - Check your network connection and firewall settings. 3. **How often is the data synced?** - The data sync frequency is determined by the settings configured during setup. You can customize the sync frequency as needed. 4. **Can I customize the data being synced?** - Yes, you can customize the data being synced by adjusting the settings during the setup process. ## Support If you need further assistance, please contact Boltic support or visit our Support Documentation.
